text: Mauritius participated in the 2010 Summer Youth Olympics in Singapore. The Mauritius team consisted of 9 athletes competing in 5 sports: athletics, badminton, judo, swimming and table tennis. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:90%" |- ! Medal !
